channel.title: InfluxDB on KK's Blog (fromkk)
channel.description: Recent content in InfluxDB on KK's Blog (fromkk)

item.title: Time boundary in InfluxDB Group by Time Statement
item.description: These days I use InfluxDB to save some time series data. I love these features it provides: High Performance #According to to it’s hardware guide, a single node will support more than 750k point write per second, 100 moderate queries per second and 10M series cardinality.
